original_text: So be ready to give things to poor people. Then you will be really clean, on the inside as well as the outside.
korean_text: 그러나 그 안에 있는 것으로 구제하라 그리하면 모든 것이 너희에게 깨끗하리라

sentences.original_text: So be ready to give things to poor people.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러니 가난한 사람들에게 줄 준비를 하세요.

sentences.original_text: Then you will be really clean,
on the inside as well as the outside.
